actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a $600 income tax credit to individuals who are volunteer firefighters.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to permit a $600 nonrefundable income tax credit to any active member of a qualified volunteer fire department.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a $600 income tax credit to individuals who are volunteer firefighters.
